data.name: ApplicationTitle
data.value: HedgeModManager

data.name: CannotFindExecutableText
data.value: HedgeModManager could not find a game executable in its startup directory. HedgeModManager can attempt to look for your game and install itself automatically.

data.name: CannotFindModsDirectoryText
data.value: A "mods" folder must exist within your game installation directory for HedgeModManager to correctly function. Would you like to create one?

data.name: ExceptionText
data.value: An error occured! See "HedgeModManager.log" for more info and report the file if possible.

data.name: icon96
data.value: ..\res\icon96.png;System.Drawing.Bitmap, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a

data.name: PiracyText
data.value: We have detected that you're using a pirated copy of {0}. Please purchase {0} off the Steam store.

data.name: update
data.value: ..\res\update.bat;System.Byte[], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

data.name: ExecutableNotPatchedText
data.value: {0} executable has not yet been patched for use with CPKREDIR, which is required to load mods. Would you like to patch the executable now?

data.name: InvalidIncludeDirText
data.value: The mod "{0}" has an invalid includeDir ({1}) Do you want HedgeModManager to attempt to fix this?

data.name: ModUpdateText
data.value:
There's a newer version of {0} available!
Do you want to update from version {1} to {2}? ({3})

data.name: NoUpdateServerAndURLText
data.value: HedgeModManager can not check for updates for {0} because it has no update server.

data.name: NoUpdateServerText
data.value:
HedgeModManager can not check for updates for {0} because it has no update server.
However, this mod does have a website. Do you want to open it and check for updates manually? URL: {1}

data.name: NoCodesText
data.value: No codes were found. Would you like HedgeModManager to download codes from it's database?

data.name: LoaderNotInstalled
data.value: The loader for {0} currently isn't installed, would you like to install it now?

data.name: LoaderMismatchText
data.value: The currently installed loader doesn't match the version on Hedge Mod Manager's Github, Unless you know what you are doing, Click "Reinstall Loader"

data.name: GameBananaRegUpdateText
data.value: We have updated the command for GameBanana's 1-Click Install. To complete the update we will need to restart HedgeModManager as Admin.

data.value: An error occured! See "HedgeModManager.log" for more info.
